analysis.description:
RSPLT_H.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! msg.sender.call.gas(withdrawGas).value(amount)() (/unique_chucks/16/0x97a8c6af1c65d27f6bb0da4a3ace902c93e24eab.sol#320-324)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/16/0x97a8c6af1c65d27f6bb0da4a3ace902c93e24eab.sol#324:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/16/0x97a8c6af1c65d27f6bb0da4a3ace902c93e24eab.sol:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"
